paper_title.ja: On the convergence of finite element solutions to the interface problem for the Stokes system (共著)
paper_title.en: On the convergence of finite element solutions to the interface problem for the Stokes system

description.en: The Stokes system with a discontinuous coefficient (Stokes interface problem) and its finite element approximations are considered. We firstly show a general error estimate. To derive explicit convergence rates, we introduce some appropriate assumptions on the regularity of exact solutions and on a geometric condition for the triangulation. We mainly deal with the MINI element approximation and then consider P1-iso-P2/P1 element approximation. Results are expected to give an instructive remark in numerical analysis for two-phase flow problems. (c) 2005 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.

publication_name.ja: Journal of Computational and Applied Mathematics
publication_name.en: JOURNAL OF COMPUTATIONAL AND APPLIED MATHEMATICS

paper_title.en: Benchmark problems for numerical schemes to passively transported interface

description.en: The interface passively transported by a prescribed flow field is considered, which relates to a part of a mathematical model for two-fluid flow. A benchmark problem is proposed. The shape of the interface transported by the flow field in the problem is deformed but analytically computable. One can fully validate the accuracy of this numerical scheme by the benchmark problem. As an example, computations are done using a scheme for which an interface convergence theorem had been proved. The result does not only show optimality of the theorem but also shows effectiveness of the benchmark problem.

publication_name.en: INTERNATIONAL JOURNAL OF COMPUTATIONAL FLUID DYNAMICS
